analysis.description:
CryptoVideoGamesToken.purchase (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#292-336) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(sellingPrice.sub(contractCut)) (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#333-334)
CryptoVideoGamesToken._isContract (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#462-468) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721 (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#86-139) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#110)
	-transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#119-120)
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#126-129)

CryptoVideoGamesToken (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#152-468) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#379-386)
	-transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xfb2397daa1851ba306cee0bcad859959f63aa4f3.sol#386-394)
